item.description: [...] DougNic wrote an interesting post today on Lower Pollution Levels Lead To A Vibrant EconomyHere’s a quick excerptSmog-bound Mexico City has been forced to implement emissions controls on cars and factories. Taiwan is even going so far as to require catalytic converters for motorcycles. Such mandates will almost inevitably benefit Germany because, … [...]
